txt.en: Upon the dwarf-ruins of Zarkul-sulûn, a deadly two-headed troll waits for those foolish enough to challenge their claim….\n\nYour mission is to defeat the two-headed troll, Brog-and-Glûk, at Zarkul-sulûn.
You have been tasked with defeating the two-headed troll, Brog-and-Glûk, at Zarkul-sulûn.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Ausma for your reward!

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].\n\n'My scouts have come back from Zarkul-sulûn. Trolls have completely taken over the Torrent-spires. This can not stand! We must return to Zarkul-sulûn and defeat their leader, the towering Brog-and-Glûk!'
Complete Mission: Two Heads are Deadlier
The monster commander in this mission will attempt a brutal wounding attack.
Your mission is to defeat the two-headed troll, Brog-and-Glûk, at Zarkul-sulûn.\n\nSpeak to Ausma to travel to Zarkul-sulûn.
'Well done! With Brog-and-Glûk defeated, we may soon be able to take hold of Zarkul-sulûn. The last thing we need is more trolls stomping around Elderslade and destroying these old ruins!'
